items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
items.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.
items.title: miksrv/simple-react-ui-kit: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.

items.content_html: NeonSys is a lightweight, real-time system monitoring application built to learn Electron. Designed for Linux, it provides users with a visually appealing and easy-to-use interface to track essential system metrics such as CPU usage, memory, disk space, and operating system information.
items.title: euphroshub/NeonSys: NeonSys is a lightweight, real-time system monitoring application built to learn Electron. Designed for Linux, it provides users with a visually appealing and easy-to-use interface to track essential system metrics such as CPU usage, memory, disk space, and operating system information.

items.content_html: BootSnip is a lightweight Chrome extension that makes <code> blocks and quoted text instantly copyable with a click. Designed to improve the learning experience on Boot.dev by reducing the friction of manually copying content.
